name: FNF Electro HEX mod
description:
ELECTRO HEX mod is a mod for the Friday Night Funkin game, or rather, an alteration of another mod - HEX.

In this mod I redid HEX textures and some others. In the near future, I will probably be improving, finalizing and fixing this mod.

I think nothing further is worth telling. And please do not write "TRANSFER THIS MOD ON MAC OS" - NO! I will not redo it on Mac OS, firstly, I don’t know how, and secondly, not every second person has a Mac. All offensive, inappropriate, and stupid topics will be deleted, we have the right to delete without writing a reason.

Have a nice day!
